text:
This log entry look suspicious:

2015/10/26 16:53:30 WARN  - jmeter.engine.util.CompoundVariable: Did not find any functions

That should not appear if the JMeter classpath has been set up correctly.

Note that JMeter is not designed to be run in this way.

The only supported way to run JMeter is to run it through the scripts, or to invoke the JMeter main method passing the appropriate parameters.
creator: sebb@apache.org
